page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The area lies within Pendle where the current unemployment rate is 15.4%.A sample survey of employment in Foulridge showed that the majority of workers are employed outside the village travelling to Colne, Burnley, Barnoldswick,Nelson etc to work in a wide variety of occupations. The Pendle Industrial handbook lists only one firm in Foulridge that employs more than a hundred people,ie Weston Electric Units Ltd who are high precision machining sub-contractors. Apart from farming,employment in Foulridge is found at Bessel Electric Ltd,Foulridge Sprayers,Bradley Mail Order,Kanda Hepple Textiles,J.W.Coates (mail order textiles),George Dixon & Co (garage),St.Michaels CofE School,and Foulridge Garden Centre.
